type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Knight Noble
rules_text:
Flying, menace, trample, first strike
[i]Hauteclere[/i] – Whenever a creature attacks, you gain 1 life.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Michalis, King of Macedon attacks a player if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, for each other opponent, create a token copy of the other creature that is tapped and attacking that player.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Michalis deals combat damage to a player, create a 3/3 red Dragon Knight creature token with flying.
